text: Fernvale LRT Station is an LRT station in Singapore. It is a station along Sengkang LRT Line. It is on the West Loop. Fernvale is the only station along the Sengkang LRT Line which uses side platforms. ==Timeline== *29 January 2005: Station opened ==Following Stations== Previous: Thanggam (SW4) Next: Layar (SW6) ==References== Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations Category:Sengkang
title: Fernvale LRT Station
